SEARCH
Package Interfaces

Interface ListADT<T>

Type Parameters:
T - o tipo dos elementos armazenados nesta lista
All Superinterfaces:
Iterable<T>
All Known Subinterfaces:
ArrayUnorderedADT<T>, OrderedListADT<T>, UnorderedListADT<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ArrayList, ArrayOrderedList, ArrayUnordered, ArrayUnorderedList, DoubleLinkedUnorderedList, DoublyLinkedList, DoublyLinkedOrderedList, LinearLinkedList, LinearLinkedOrderedList, LinearLinkedUnorderedList
public interface ListADT<T> extends Iterable<T>
Esta interface define o ADT para uma lista genérica.

Esta interface estende a interface Iterable<T>, permitindo que a lista seja iterável.
